metadata.description: The groundbreaking Infestation series, IDW's first-ever event, saw many teams from multiple universes fight off a zombie invasion. Now, an even bigger threat has risen to threaten the growing IDW multiverse: Lovecraftian demons threaten to reach across time and space and destroy everyone everywhere and everywhen! A threat that perhaps not even TRANSFORMERS, G.I. JOEs, Danger Girl, and others can surmount!
metadata.name: Infestation 2: Team Up
